prayer_book.description: A book containing prayers and religious texts.

page_1.text: O light of the dawn, guide my steps through shadow and doubt. Grant me wisdom to discern, courage to act, and compassion to heal.

page_2.text: Blessed be the hands that mend, the hearts that forgive, and the souls that seek peace. May the radiance of hope shine upon all who walk in faith.

page_3.text: In the hour of darkness, I call upon the strength within and the unity of all. Shield me from evil, strengthen my resolve, and let my words be true.

page_4.text: Let this book be a beacon to the lost, a comfort to the weary, and a reminder of the sacred path. As it is written, so may it be.
